title: Designing Online Discussion-Based Science Teacher Education Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Online discussion skill-based competency enhancement course for science teachers and educational practitioners, featuring practice-oriented design linked to project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more questions that deepen peers’ perspectives while performing the "First Responder/Connector (FR/C)" role in online asynchronous discussions.
Learners achieve over 80% in social, cognitive, and teaching presence in science-related discussions by applying the Community of Inquiry (CoI) model.
Learners can propose one or more science lesson design project ideas by synthesizing discussion content based on peer feedback and instructor-guided questions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
